title: IEEE Body Sensor Networks Presentation Los Angeles
description: Presented research on the quantification of opioid withdrawal through seismocardiogram variability from wearable CardioTag devices.

title: Quantifying Opioid Withdrawal through Cardio-mechanical Variability using Multi-modal Wearable Sensors
description: IEEE BSN conference. This study demonstrates a significant correlation between cardio-mechanical variability (SCG signals) and subjective withdrawal severity, proposing a new objective biomarker for monitoring recovery.

title: Seven ECE Graduates Receive NSF Research Fellowship
description: Featured in an article by Georgia Tech's School of Electrical and Computer Engineering highlighting the recipients of the prestigious NSF Research Fellowship.

title: Honored by Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs
description: Recognized by Vice Chancellor Sharon Jones for fellowship achievements at the University of Washington Bothell Student Academic Showcase.

title: Incarceration to Innovation
description: Featured in a news piece from the School of Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics at the University of Washington Bothell.

title: Awarded NSF Graduate Research Fellowship (GRFP)
description: Recipient of the National Science Foundation's Graduate Research Fellowship Program (GRFP), a prestigious award supporting outstanding graduate students.

title: HELPSE: Privacy-Preserving Password Strength Estimation
description: GLSVLSI '22 conference. This work introduces a secure method to evaluate password strength on cloud servers without ever decrypting the user's data.

title: Gabriel E. Gallardo Symposium Presentation
description: Presented research on an 'Independent Measurement Platform for Federated Learning Models on Android Devices' at the University of Washington.

title: Giving a Voice to the Community
description: Featured in The Daily at the University of Washington for excellence in machine learning research and community impact.

title: From Prison to Purpose
description: Profiled by the University of Washington Bothell news for my personal journey and academic achievements in STEM.

title: Awarded Mary Gates Research Scholarship
description: Received the Mary Gates Research Scholarship at the University of Washington, which supports undergraduates engaged in research.

title: Caring Without Sharing: Privacy-Preserving Urban Crowdsensing
description: EAI Mobiquitous conference. This work introduces a framework for smart cities that leverages federated learning to collect diverse urban data while keeping sensitive user information private on-device.

title: SACNAS National Diversity in STEM Conference
description: Presented 'Android On-device Federated Learning of PyTorch Models with Flower' at the SACNAS National Diversity in STEM conference.
